name: Riho Bonespear
aura: Increase Ally ATK in Faction Crypts by 42

skills.desc:
Attacks 1 enemy. 

Places a 15% [Continuous Heal] buff on the ally with the lowest HP for 1 turn. Also places a 7.5% [Continuous Heal] buff on all allies with 30% HP or less for 1 turn.
skills.name: Absorbtion
skills.books:
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +5%
Lvl. 5 Damage +5%

skills.desc: Places a [Stun] debuff on a target enemy for 1 turn, as well as a [HP Burn] debuff, a 60% [Decrease DEF] debuff, a 25% [Weaken] debuff, a 50% [Decrease ATK] debuff, and a 30% [Decrease C.RATE] debuff for 2 turns, then attacks the target.
skills.name: Pressure Points
skills.books:
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +5%
Lvl. 5 Damage +10%

skills.desc: Removes all debuffs from all allies, then places a [Block Debuffs] buff on them for 2 turns. Also heals all allies by 35% of their MAX HP, and by a further 5% for each debuff removed from them.
skills.name: Perfect Body

skills.desc:
When receiving any debuffs, instantly transfers them from this Champion to the attacker. 

[Will not transfer debuffs that cannot be removed.]
skills.name: Reflect [P]
